name: Third Person Blueprint: REMIX
description:
Now usually I don't do this but uh

Go head' on and break 'em off wit a lil' preview of the remix

A personal challenge: Make something that feels good and is fun to play, WITHOUT modifying the default 3rd person character's friction, jump height, air mobility, etc in Unreal Engine and adding no new mechanics like double jumping, air dashing, etc. Up to you if I succeeded or not.

Made in 2 days mostly one day so don't get mad if something is broken 

I'm sorry there's no Linux release I know it's a penguin but I just can't do it
